Posts.Content: Mar 25, 2008 09:45PM sharjo wrote: I'm glad to find this site.  I have had radiation induced brachial plexopathy since 1997.  I have not found anyone that had this condition until now.  I have adapted fairly well but, it's been difficult doing things with only one hand.  I would like to chat with anyone who has been living with brachial plexus injury.
Posts.Title: radiation-induced brachial plexopathy Erica35 ryder51
